attributes.review: If your looking for some interesting fiction to read this is a wonderful app. it kept me entertained for days but i have reason to believe it tracked my location. one foggy night i heard a knock on my door while me, my wife, and my 17 children were watching a movie. i opened it to a cockroach wearing a MAGA hat. he and about 1,000 other roaches came in and stole my whole entire family. they shoved hem them in the back of a clown car and left me alone in my home with me and my pet rat, fergalicious. its been weeks and no justice has been served. i'm absolutely devastated. great app thoğŸ’–
